item.title: 2,419 houses under PMAY are under construction in Raichur, says Minister
item.description:
<![CDATA[Urban Development Minister B.S. Suresh said that the State government, with the aid of the Union government, has been constructing ground-plus-3 model houses in the State, and around 2,419 houses are under construction at the outskirts of Raichur city (near Yarmaras village).
He was speaking after visiting the construction site on Wednesday.
These houses are being constructed under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) scheme, which aims to construct houses under the Affordable Housing in Part...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Father-son duo among two dead, two injured in accidents in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: A lorry ran over two people, killing them instantly, on the outskirts of Raichur on Monday. The victims, identified as Ramesh (36) and his father Nagappa (58). The body of one of the deceased was cleaved into two in the accidennt.
The father-son duo were standing by the roadside near Yarmarus bypass when the accident occurred. According to reports, Nagappa was talking on his mobile phone and Ramesh was standing beside him when the lorry veered off course and hit them.
The impact was s...]]>
item.author: Public Tv English
